thread.section_title: Avalon Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Second stay
thread.title_full: Second stay - Review of Avalon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Paul T
title: Second stay
text:
My partner, her 16 yr old daughter and I stayed in this lovely Hotel that is only two blocks away from the Empire State Building in October 2014. It's such a great hotel that's easily accessible to most of the usual sight seeing places. The suite that we had was clean, comfortable and quiet (2 queen sized beds and a sofa bed).
There was a good selection for breakfast each day.
The Avalon Hotel is that good, my partner and I are going there for our pre wedding honeymoon in June.
